#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

void Process(vector<long long int>& arr, long long int size)
{
	long long int i,j;
	vector<long long int> temp(size);
	for(i=0;i<size;i++)
		cin >> arr[i];
		
	sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
	
	temp = arr;

	j = 0;
	for(i=0;i<size && j<size;i++,j+=2)
		arr[j] = temp[i];

	j = 1;
	for(;i<size && j<size;i++,j+=2)
		arr[j] = temp[i];		
}

main()
{
	long long int tests;
	cin>>tests;
	for(;tests>0;tests--)
	{
		long long int size,i;
		cin >> size;
		vector<long long int> arr(size);
		Process(arr,size);
		for(i=0;i<size;i++)
			cout << arr[i] << " ";
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
